title: Watch Face: Chamber of Anubis
summary: The mystery of Anubis lives on in this lustrous golden watch face.
description: Experience the mystery of this enigmatic watch face.  The power of Anubis hides within his secret chamber.  The mystery of the lock to this secret chamber lies in this watch face, ever dormant.  Can you unravel the mystery?The watch face shines with brilliant gold and gems to impress as you read the time.  The hour and minute hands are sapphires that glow and move about the watch face in a smooth manner for accurate to-the-millisecond time reading.  The hands are positioned like a real watch for easy reading.  The second hand ticks smoothly and is encrusted with a ruby.  The date is listed optionally in MM/DD/YYYY format.  The numbers and inner core glow with a smooth pulse of radiating energy.The settings menu allows you to choose if you want to display the date.  It also allows you to select between a shifting puzzle, a stable panel with the hieroglyphics of Anubis, or the glowing portal to the chamber within.This watch face will work on most Android Wear smartwatches.  As such, Android Wear is required in order to install this watch face onto your smartwatch.
descriptionHTML:
Experience the mystery of this enigmatic watch face. The power of Anubis hides within his secret chamber. The mystery of the lock to this secret chamber lies in this watch face, ever dormant. Can you unravel the mystery?
The watch face shines with brilliant gold and gems to impress as you read the time. The hour and minute hands are sapphires that glow and move about the watch face in a smooth manner for accurate to-the-millisecond time reading. The hands are positioned like a real watch for easy reading. The second hand ticks smoothly and is encrusted with a ruby. The date is listed optionally in MM/DD/YYYY format. The numbers and inner core glow with a smooth pulse of radiating energy.
The settings menu allows you to choose if you want to display the date. It also allows you to select between a shifting puzzle, a stable panel with the hieroglyphics of Anubis, or the glowing portal to the chamber within.

This watch face will work on most Android Wear smartwatches. As such, Android Wear is required in order to install this watch face onto your smartwatch.
